note:
I'm a transgender woman who creates various kinds of games (mostly tabletop) on itch.io. I wouldn't say I'm especially talented at it but I enjoy the process and practicing at it pretty much constantly is making me better over time.

I like books (mostly horror and fantasy) and long form video essays about political and social issues. I listen to metal, electronica, folk, and rap.

I'm schizoaffective. It does affect my ability to think clearly from time to time, so expect some strangeness.
